About.title: About Us
About.description: We are a team of music enthusiasts who are passionate about providing the latest and most comprehensive event information to music lovers. Whether you're into rock, classical, or pop music, we've got you covered.
About.missionDescription: Our mission is to connect artists and audiences, making every performance an unforgettable experience. We believe in the power of music to bridge language and cultural barriers, bringing people together.
About.teamDescription: Our team consists of music and technology enthusiasts. Each member is dedicated to providing the best event information experience for users.

Landing.title: More Than Just the Great Wall: Experience China's Electrifying Concerts
Landing.description: Beyond the Great Wall and Forbidden City, China offers a dynamic fusion of tradition and modernity. Experience world-class concerts by international artists, cutting-edge art exhibitions, and exciting cultural festivals. Immerse yourself in a country where ancient wonders meet contemporary excitement.

whyChina.subtitle: Experience China
whyChina.title: Concerts & Tourism
whyChina.description: Discover the perfect blend of world-class entertainment and cultural exploration in China. Attend unforgettable concerts and explore the country's rich heritage.

0.name: Popular International Artists
0.description: Experience performances by global stars like Charlie Puth, YOASOBI, Kanye West, Fujii Kaze, and many more in China.

1.name: World-Class Venues
1.description: Enjoy concerts in state-of-the-art stadiums with excellent acoustics and visual effects.

2.name: Scenic Tourism
2.description: Combine your concert experience with visits to China's breathtaking landscapes and cultural sites.

3.name: Affordable and Convenient
3.description: Take advantage of visa-free travel to China and enjoy cost-effective entertainment and travel options.

email.title: Stay updated on the latest concerts in China
email.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter
email.privacyNotice: Get exclusive updates on upcoming concerts and tours in China. We respect your privacy.

AllTable.title: China Event Information
AllTable.description: Find the latest information on concerts, stage performances, and cultural events by popular artists in China. Check out live schedules and venue information for major cities like Beijing, Shanghai, and Guangzhou.

Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.popularPerformancesDescription: Here are performances by famous artists, well-known shows, and popular venues
